name: ICBM
tagline: Strategic Offense Initiative — A game simulating user-designed programmable ICBMs, and your own personal nuclear war.
body:
### Welcome to the Strategic Offense Initiative
Start your own ICBM program, in the comfort of your own home.
Build your missiles, program them, and rain down death on your enemies (or friends).

### Features
Currently Strategic Offense Initiative only simulates a fixed rocket, but the following are planned:
* Build your own missile out of missile parts (warheads, guidance computers, engines, etc.)
* Program your guidance computers and timers
* Research new parts for your construction
* Multiplayer — fight your friends for world domination
* Defend innocent civilian cities from your enemies missiles

### Authors and Contributors
Created by Caleb Jones (@porglezomp), Owen Hughes (@OkayHughes), and Tal Dohn

### Support or Contact
You can report bugs on the [github page](https://github.com/porglezomp/ICBM), and you can find Caleb on twitter ([@stickfigure42](https://twitter.com/stickfigure42))
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
